channel.desc: When Lily's father decides to move the family out of the Lake District, Peter comes up with a clever, but dangerous, plan to change Dr Bobtail's mind.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
channel.desc: Kwazii takes Tracker to the desert for his final test to become an Octo-Agent but they get lost while helping a young golden mole. To survive, they must do as the desert creatures do and find water.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: PJ Masks
channel.desc: An Yu needs to find a magic stone in the city.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
channel.desc: Pam has been struggling to sell her large family home in Harrogate, North Yorkshire for a year. Secret Agent Phil Spencer steps in to explore the reasons why this house in a desirable area just won't shift.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Bluey and Bingo want a pet. To show them how much work they'd be in for, Dad transforms his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu with a taste for trouble.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps to hatch an egg but it takes ages & when it finally cracks open, he gets a real surprise!

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: Norrie is upset when she sees a leaf fall from the tree, because she thinks it's broken.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Andy And The Band
channel.desc: After a surprise visit from Blu's gran reveals that Blu hasn't told her that he's in a band, the Odd Socks are forced into pretending that he is a lawyer. Can they keep up the lie?

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Spicks And Specks
channel.desc: Adam, Myf and Alan are joined by Ross Noble, Ngaiire, Eamon Sandwith from the Chats, Meshel Laurie and Ghost Medium. They will sell their jewellery to solve this week's secret song.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: A slick sales rep visits and despite Pancake's doubts convinces the Piris to buy flippers.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Bluey, Snickers and Winton are on their way to ask Calypso for help with their problems, when they are ambushed by the Terriers and use their unique talents to get past.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Shaun The Sheep
channel.desc: After getting covered in soot, two hapless ducks are mistaken for a pair of rare African zebra ducks.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: QI
channel.desc: Join Sandi Toksvig and panellists Stephen K Amos, Ivo Graham, Holly Walsh and Alan Davies for silly season.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: The Mysterious Benedict Society
channel.desc: The Society splits up to escape an attack. Number Two and Mr. Benedict plot against Dr. Curtain.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Annabel Crabb's Civic Duty
channel.desc: We begin with one of the enduring oddities of the Australian electoral system - preferential voting. Vaunted by mathematicians and theorists as a fairer way of voting. Adopted, uniquely, by Australia in 1918.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Crongton
channel.desc: Liccle hides a package for Manjaro before deciding to dispose of it to protect everyone.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Fresh Off The Boat
channel.desc: Evan is thrilled to open his first bank account, but is unsure whether to use his American name or his Taiwanese name, leading Louis and Jessica to reveal how each of them acquired their American names and how they first met.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition
channel.desc: Join John Barron and Chas Licciardello as they take a deeper look at the people, issues and politics driving America this week. Plus longer interviews and in-depth discussions on the second Trump presidency.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Fresh Off The Boat
channel.desc: Jessica's decision to rent out the flip house instead of selling it backfires on her, Honey and Grandma. Meanwhile, amateur detectives Emery and Evan take on the mystery of Louis' missing watch.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Abbott Elementary
channel.desc: The competition heats up between Melissa and Janine as their classes go head-to-head in a read-a-thon sponsored by a local pizza shop.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Abbott Elementary
channel.desc: Two of Janine's students aren't getting along, leading her to seek advice from her colleagues on how to help repair their friendship.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Offsiders
channel.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel discuss the week in sport including the final countdown to the First Ashes Test between Australia and England in Perth, the WBBL, AFLW Finals Series, the A Leagues, NBL and WNBL.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Speechless
channel.desc: JJ's love-match with Izzy becomes a cage match with Kenneth, Maya and Jimmy dismiss Valentine's Day as a holiday for suckers until they find a way to profit from it, and Ray invites Dylan on a pre-paid romantic night out.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: ER
channel.desc: Mark becomes suspicious when his wife and daughter are in a car crash with Jennifer's male co-worker. Carol tries to help a schizophrenic architect, and Lewis chooses between a career-changing opportunity or caring for Susie.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Merlin
channel.desc: Morgana is tormented by dreams of Guinevere becoming Queen of Camelot. Encouraged by Morgause, she decides to reveal Arthur and Gwen's courtship to Uther, who will do whatever it takes to stop his son from marrying her.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: My Family
channel.desc: Two old friends of the Harpers are having trouble with their marriage and when Susan and Ben take opposing sides, it's not long before they start arguing too. Michael tries to transform Alfie into an internet musical star.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Secrets Of The Zoo
channel.desc: Two baby white rhinos join the herd at The Wilds; a pair of red pandas have a blind date in a tree; and a super-cute tortoise baffles its doctors.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Rage
channel.desc: Australia's longest running music TV show, rage is home to the biggest vault of music videos from a diverse range of artists, genres and eras. We curate the best clips of all time to surprise and entertain you for hours.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: BTN High
channel.desc: BTN High breaks down the week's biggest news stories for Aussie high schoolers.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Dara O Briain joins Rattus for a show marking the 1969 moon landings: the first use of rocket power, the Space Race, and poo floating in the Apollo 10 cockpit - it's all here!

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Dara O Briain joins Rattus for a show marking the 1969 moon landings: the first use of rocket power, the Space Race, and poo floating in the Apollo 10 cockpit - it's all here![(96057)]

channel.name: ABC ME AU

channel.desc: Rory is bewildered and confused when he finds out a grade six girl likes him and Debra-Jo can't understand why she feels so cross about it.

channel.name: ABC ME AU
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Gwen rushes to save Irene, who risks missing her important exam to play in Ron's band, while Felicity and June search for the missing time capsule.

channel.name: ABC ME AU
channel.title: Junior Vets
channel.desc: It's day one at vet school. Six ordinary school kids have been chosen from a thousand applicants. This episode, the raw recruits help test lonely horse Brie for a life-threatening illness.[(96057)]

channel.name: ABC News 24 AU

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: BRAVO K-SCIENTIST
channel.desc: There are people who, unafraid of failure, take on challenges for new discoveries and embark on expeditions into the unknown without hesitation. They are the K-Scientists leading Korea?s world of science. The most outstanding scientists in Korea. What were the joys of science they discovered after repeated failures, and what were the joys of life they realized through such experiences? Join us on a journey into their everyday lives.? VOD service is currently not available due to copyright issues.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: DIPLOMAT'S ARCHIVE: HIDDEN STORIES
channel.desc: As of April 2025, S. Korea has established diplomatic relations with a total of 194 countries. Among them are countries that have had ties and exchanges with Korea for hundreds of years. With such long-standing relationships with so many nations, might there be fascinating hidden stories between Korea and the rest of the world that we don?t know yet? \"Diplomat?s Archives: Hidden Stories\" begins with this very question. Together with foreign embassies in Korea, the series uncovers and sheds light on meaningful yet lesser-known stories between Korea and other countries. Through this, we aim to reaffirm the deep friendships that have been built over time, highlight how countries are interconnected?bilaterally and multilaterally? and emphasize the importance of cooperation on the global stage today.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: RPG
channel.desc: What is it like to love in Korea? Where do people usually go on dates, and what makes K-romance unique? (Romantic Path Guide) is a reality dating show where a foreign participant experiences love and dating in Korea while exploring its iconic landmarks. With fun missions to complete, encounters to discover, and moments to share, it?s a journey that feels just like playing an ? only this time, in real life. A mix of travel, culture, and romance. Step into the adventure and discover the path to love in Korea!

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: EXPLORING KOREAN LITERATURE B
channel.desc:
2021 Exploring Korean Literature There is a growing interest in Korean literature among readers from around the world and so we bring Korean classics to Korean modern literature to viewers in this special series under three themes. What They?ve Read Well-known TV personalities read three translated works of Korean literature that have recently received attention. Kim Soom's novel \"One Left\", brings the comfort women issue to the forefront of the literary world, and her book is recited and discussed by Darcy Paquet, a translator and essayist for the film \"Parasite,\" and translator and essayist Colin Marshall, Italian architect Simone Carena, and fashion designer Shin Ji-hye. The novel was published in the U.S. in September 2020 and a second book print was released this year. Cho Nam-Joo's novel \"Kim Jiyoung, Born 1982\" has been translated into 25 languages and is recited by TV personality Daniel Hicks (UK), Carlos Gorito (Brazil), YouTuber Sarah Mack (USA) and singer Punita (India) who share their thoughts about the book. Howon, a member of the boy band, W24, recites passages from Kim Young-ha's novel \"Diary of a Murderer\" and gives commentary. Living to Tell a Story This documentary features Korean writers whose works are not only popular in Korea but also overseas. In episode 1, poet Kim Yi-deum, the Winner of the National Translation Award and the Lucien Stryk Award for her collection of poems, \"Hysteria,\" as well as Korean novelists Kim Cho-Yup and Kim Yeon-su appear to talk about the creative process and how they carry out research before writing a novel. In Episode 2, novelist Yun Ko-Eun, the winner of the Crime Fiction in Translation Dagger award for her book, \"The Disaster Tourist\", and novelist Ha Seong-nan and poet Jin Eun-young explain what they were trying to convey to readers through their works. In Episode 3, novelist Hwang Sok-young, whose works are mostly inspired by his own experience of living in modern Korean society, tells the story of his life and literary journey. A Word Depicted in Stories The cultural characteristics in Korean literature that encompasses Korean classics to modern novels are highlighted on this show. Six episodes with different themes ranging from female poets in classical literature, makeup culture, wine and arts, tea ceremony, pets, and a literary discussion forum will begin airing on November 5th. -->
.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: DIVE INTO KOREAN
channel.desc: ?Dive into Korean? is an introductory educational documentary series designed for learners beginning their journey with the Korean language. The program explores the historical and cultural essence of Hangeul, the Korean alphabet, and the spirit behind its creation by King Sejong the Great. Through engaging storytelling and real-life experiences, the series helps viewers understand the beauty, science, and philosophy embedded in the Korean language. Episode 1: Hangeul ? A Script Anyone Can Learn Easily Discover how Hangeul was designed as an easy and logical writing system for all people, embodying King Sejong?s vision of communication and equality. Episode 2: Hangeul ? A Script That Illustrates the Sounds of Speech Explore the scientific principles behind Hangeul?s creation ? how its characters visually represent the shape and movement of the human speech organs. Episode 3: The More You Know the Culture, the Closer You Get to Korean Understand how culture and language intertwine, and how learning about Korean traditions and expressions brings learners closer to authentic communication. Episode 4: Korean Language Connecting the World Witness how Korean has grown into a global language of culture, creativity, and connection ? a bridge linking people across nations.\"Sponsored by King Sejong Institute Foundation\".

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: K-CHAT: CONVERSING IN KOREAN
channel.desc: \"What would you say in Korean in a situation like this?\" Discover how to express yourself in various daily life situations in Korean, from greetings and making friends to making promises and ordering your favorite food. A comprehensive Korean program designed to teach Korean language through real-life situations! A global initiative featuring top performers. Benefit from clear and friendly explanations by Peter Vint, a British TV personality who mastered Korean himself. Engage in lively Korean language lessons taught by Korean-American idols Aaron and Alexa! Experience a delightful Korean language course that delves into culture, trends, and even generational nuances. Each lesson is a concise 10-minute package, including scenarios, explanations, and practical exercises. Enjoy short, yet entertaining content that will also provide insight into culture, trends, and generational diversity. With just a glance, you'll be able to speak Korean fluently. Embark on an enjoyable and refreshing journey through our Korean language course.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: K-CHAT: TRAVEL IN KOREA
channel.desc: Simple and Fun Korean Lessons, ?K-Chat: Travel in Korea? What are the most useful expressions visitors to Korea can use right away?From arriving at the airport to finding your hotel and exploring popular travel destinations, this program offers practical expressions for your Korean language journey. It also covers traditional Korean culture and essential travel information, making it an invaluable resource for beginner to intermediate learners! Discover Korean travel expressions in an engaging and entertaining way with skits performed by ONF?s Hyo-jin, Seung-jun, Wyatt, and Alexa. With clear and accessible explanations from Hye-rim of the Wonder Girls, a graduate of Hankuk University of Foreign Studies, you?ll systematically improve your Korean!

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: EXPLORING KOREAN LITERATURE B
channel.desc:
2021 Exploring Korean Literature There is a growing interest in Korean literature among readers from around the world and so we bring Korean classics to Korean modern literature to viewers in this special series under three themes. What They?ve Read Well-known TV personalities read three translated works of Korean literature that have recently received attention. Kim Soom's novel \"One Left\", brings the comfort women issue to the forefront of the literary world, and her book is recited and discussed by Darcy Paquet, a translator and essayist for the film \"Parasite,\" and translator and essayist Colin Marshall, Italian architect Simone Carena, and fashion designer Shin Ji-hye. The novel was published in the U.S. in September 2020 and a second book print was released this year. Cho Nam-Joo's novel \"Kim Jiyoung, Born 1982\" has been translated into 25 languages and is recited by TV personality Daniel Hicks (UK), Carlos Gorito (Brazil), YouTuber Sarah Mack (USA) and singer Punita (India) who share their thoughts about the book. Howon, a member of the boy band, W24, recites passages from Kim Young-ha's novel \"Diary of a Murderer\" and gives commentary. Living to Tell a Story This documentary features Korean writers whose works are not only popular in Korea but also overseas. In episode 1, poet Kim Yi-deum, the Winner of the National Translation Award and the Lucien Stryk Award for her collection of poems, \"Hysteria,\" as well as Korean novelists Kim Cho-Yup and Kim Yeon-su appear to talk about the creative process and how they carry out research before writing a novel. In Episode 2, novelist Yun Ko-Eun, the winner of the Crime Fiction in Translation Dagger award for her book, \"The Disaster Tourist\", and novelist Ha Seong-nan and poet Jin Eun-young explain what they were trying to convey to readers through their works. In Episode 3, novelist Hwang Sok-young, whose works are mostly inspired by his own experience of living in modern Korean society, tells the story of his life and literary journey. A Word Depicted in Stories The cultural characteristics in Korean literature that encompasses Korean classics to modern novels are highlighted on this show. Six episodes with different themes ranging from female poets in classical literature, makeup culture, wine and arts, tea ceremony, pets, and a literary discussion forum will begin airing on November 5th. -->
.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: DIPLOMAT'S ARCHIVE: HIDDEN STORIES
channel.desc: As of April 2025, S. Korea has established diplomatic relations with a total of 194 countries. Among them are countries that have had ties and exchanges with Korea for hundreds of years. With such long-standing relationships with so many nations, might there be fascinating hidden stories between Korea and the rest of the world that we don?t know yet? \"Diplomat?s Archives: Hidden Stories\" begins with this very question. Together with foreign embassies in Korea, the series uncovers and sheds light on meaningful yet lesser-known stories between Korea and other countries. Through this, we aim to reaffirm the deep friendships that have been built over time, highlight how countries are interconnected?bilaterally and multilaterally? and emphasize the importance of cooperation on the global stage today.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Lee and Chris are in Tamworth to transform mum Jade and daughter Charlie's tiny unloved plot into a pink-inspired garden. They both love all shades of the colour, from magenta to mauve, and feel this would be a perfect palette for their forever home. Can the Garden Rescue team achieve all this on a ?4500 budget?

channel.desc: Derek takes an icy dip in a glacial lake, then visits Portmeirion and Llangollen.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Landward
channel.desc: Dougie, Cammy and Anne are bound for the Isle of Islay. Dougie visits some of the island's world-famous distilleries, and Anne catches up with Glenn Campbell.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
channel.desc: More tasty treats from Sabrina Ghayour, Olia Hercules, Theo Randall and Seema Pankhania! Also, Rick Stein and Clive Myrie head out across the UK and abroad.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Nadiya's British Food Adventure
channel.desc: Nadiya is in the West Country to check out garlic and jam. She meets Sarah Churchill, who has her own preserve-making business, and Mark Botwright, who has been growing garlic since 1997. Back at her kitchen, Nadiya creates a cream tea with a twist.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Great Food Guys
channel.desc: Nick Nairn and Dougie Vipond focus on meat and cook a rack of Scotch lamb with roast miso aubergine and sauce vierge. Joining them in the kitchen are shepherdess Michelle Stephen from Aberdeenshire and comedian farmer Jim Smith, who selects a local Perthshire beer to accompany the food.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: OFF Air

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Lover Come Back
channel.desc: An ambitious advertising executive is determined to win an account from her rival - not knowing that he has fabricated a non-existent product.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Pillow Talk
channel.desc: Interior designer Jan loathes playboy Brad because he is always hogging the line in his attempts to seduce women. He in turn thinks she is a strident harridan who sabotages his pick-up lines. However, they then meet without knowing each other's identity - and set off sparks of a different kind.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Celebrity Race Across the World
channel.desc: The race to the Guajira Peninsula is underway. Leaving the lake town of Flores, the teams can choose to travel through the mountainous heartland of Guatemala or discover southern Belize, exploring the golden sands of the Caribbean coast. They might also opt to take the path less travelled through Honduras, one of Central America's least visited countries, on their way to the second checkpoint, El Zonte, a surf mecca along the Pacific coast of El Salvador.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: DP World Tour Championship, DP World Tour Golf
channel.desc: Highlights as golfers on the European Tour battle it out in the season's final tournament.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Eva Longoria: Searching for Spain
channel.desc: Returning to her ancestral roots, Eva Longoria explores Asturias' majestic mountains, orchards, and seas, discovering the region's rich culinary traditions.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads
channel.desc: Stephen Mangan and comedian Lara Ricote, who have never met before, aim to reach the northernmost point of Australia.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Top Gear
channel.desc: Jeremy Clarkson subjects the new Kia Cee'd to a thorough road test involving eels, curry, a rock legend, an American cop, and a rather unusual game of rugby involving James May. Meanwhile, Richard Hammond is in Mexico for a nervous road test of the Mastretta sports car, a trio of hot hatchbacks tear it up on the test track, and another top celebrity takes their turn as the `Star in the Reasonably Priced Car'.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
channel.desc: Paul and Bob are determined to catch a big perch and head to Herefordshire, where they hope their best chances lie.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Daisy May and Charlie Cooper's NightWatch
channel.desc: Daisy invites Charlie to join her at an art deco Everyman cinema, originally built in 1937, just outside the famous city walls of York - said to be the most haunted city in Europe.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Untouchables
channel.desc: Lavish thriller about an idealistic federal agent who vows to bring down Al Capone and his underworld crime syndicate in Prohibition-era Chicago. With police corruption rife, he forms a special team for the task and relies on a veteran street cop - passed over for promotion because he is honest - to clean up the force and trap Capone.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Question Time
channel.desc: Features a studio audience quizzing top politicians on the events of the day. The panel surrounding presenter Fiona Bruce is composed of at least one member of the three major parties.

channel.name: BBC Two NL

channel.name: BBC Two NL

channel.name: BBC Two NL

channel.desc: Mary is joined by her kindred spirit, the globally renowned chef Jamie Oliver. Featuring the classic mushroom-stuffed watercraft chicken, an updated way to make lamb with a rich spiced tagine, a delectable prawn curry, and a lemon drizzle cake.

channel.desc: This time on Shark Bites, Steve Backshall tracks down the ultimate aquatic athlete. Taking mega-migrations around the Atlantic and Pacific oceans, the blue sharks are ocean Olympians. Steve catches up with a couple of these bolts of blue off the Californian coast, before heading to the Shark Lab to reveal how these canny creatures rely on their super-liver to provide buoyancy, and hitch a ride on ocean currents, allowing these athletes to make mega-migrations across the great oceans.

Squawk returns to find Danger Mouse bound and gagged and that the Danger Babies have made off with the Danger Car and are on their way to Arkwirght Asylum to free the 'heroes' from Danger Mouse's topsy-turvy story.

With Penfold busy inventing tasks so they can earn his favour, no one has noticed that a jam spillage in the professor?s experiment has brought a sticky surprise to life - a super-sized jam monster which might just ruin all of their plans.

As DM races off to stop Badboy, unwittingly bringing Pinfold along for the ride, Penfold commandeers various modes of transport hoping to catch up with them at Nelson?s Column, a pristine tempting target for Badboy.

With DM sidelined Penfold must take up the mantle of the last giraffe warrior, a hero destined to save the planet from peril.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When Stinkweasel drops a rain of yukkiness onto the forest, the Fairy Squad, with their excellent flying skills, decide they are the ones for the job. However, Hoofius insists this should be their quest, even if he does hate ick! And when the Fairy Squad get their wings gunked and are unable to fly, the heroes can resume their quest to end Stinkweasel?s reign of stinky nonsense - no flying required.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Herbert has invented a new contraption to help him fly using an old set of bagpipes. The 'Herbecopter', as Herbert likes to call it, is rather noisy but extremely effective, and Twinkle is unhappy at no longer being the only flying hero. So, when the heroes quest to get Friendlyface?s priceless locket back from a dragon, Twinkle and Herbert become extremely competitive and risk completely failing the quest.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When Blossom accidentally uses a witch?s broom to make sticks for toasting marshmallows, the owner of the broom casts a spell of squeaky voices on all the heroes. The spell will be lifted once the heroes have returned with new broomstick branches. A simple enough quest, think the heroes, until they realise that a witch?s broom can only be made from the branches of the Really Spooky Tree.

channel.name: CSPAN 2 US
channel.title: C-SPAN Tours the National Air & Space Museum
channel.desc: C-SPAN tours the Smithsonian's National Air & Space Museum in Washington, D.C., where we look at Apollo 11's lunar lander, Charles Lindbergh's plane that flew across the Atlantic, the X-15 that Neil Armstrong flew, and much more.

channel.name: CSPAN 2 US
channel.title: Reel America
channel.desc: The SeaLab III Command Information Bureau film shows a 1968 Navy experiment in which aquanauts lived in a sea-floor habitat off San Clemente Island, Calif.

channel.name: CSPAN 2 US
channel.title: America 250
channel.desc: Documentary Filmmaker Ken Burns, Author Rick Atkinson, and Retired Marine Corps Gen. Joseph Dunford discuss Revolutionary War leadership at an event held at George Washington's Mount Vernon.

channel.title: Washington Journal

channel.name: CSPAN 2 US
channel.title: Lectures in History
channel.desc: Classroom lectures on American history.

channel.name: CSPAN 2 US
channel.title: American History TV
channel.desc: Airing weekends, "American History TV" offers programming about people and events that document the American story, geared toward history aficionados. Shows that air under the "American History TV" banner cover the history of the nation, from its founding in the 18th century through modern times. Topics covered include the Civil War, presidents and the exploration of historical sites.

channel.name: CSPAN 2 US
channel.title: The Presidency
channel.desc: Historic speeches of former U.S. presidents as well as their policies and legacies.

channel.name: CSPAN 2 US
channel.title: Book TV
channel.desc: This long-running staple of the C-SPAN2 weekend schedule helps expand the channel's programming beyond politics. Most episodes of "Book TV" feature discussions with authors of nonfiction books, usually in the form of interviews, lectures or seminars. The series sometimes includes coverage of major book fairs and festivals. Some of the notable names who have appeared on the show include David Mamet and Tom Clancy.

channel.name: Comet US
channel.title: Limitless
channel.desc: Facing unemployment and his girlfriend's rejection, writer Eddie Morra is sure that he has no future. That all changes when an old friend gives him a drug that produces enhanced mental acuity. Stoked on the untested chemical, Eddie rises to the top of the financial world and attracts the attention of a tycoon (Robert De Niro) who intends to use him to make a fortune. But terrible side-effects and a dwindling supply threaten to collapse Eddie's house of cards.

channel.name: Comet US

channel.name: Comet US
channel.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
channel.desc: As Adm. James T. Kirk (William Shatner) and Capt. Spock (Leonard Nimoy) monitor trainees at Starfleet Academy, another vessel from the United Federation of Planets is about to try out the planet-creating Genesis Device in a seemingly deserted portion of space. In the process, two of Kirk's officers are captured by Khan (Ricardo Montalban), an enemy Kirk thought he'd never see again. Once more, Kirk takes the Enterprise's helm, where he meets Khan's ship in an intergalactic showdown.

channel.name: Comet US
channel.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
channel.desc: The crew of the Starship Enterprise returns home after an act of terrorism within its own organization destroys most of Starfleet and what it represents, leaving Earth in a state of crisis. With a personal score to settle, Capt. James T. Kirk leads his people on a mission to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction, thereby propelling all of them into a game of life and death.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: Life, Liberty & Levin
channel.desc: Mark Levin hosts FOX News Channel's "Life, Liberty and Levin." The program aims to explore the fundamental values and principles of American society, politics, culture, and current events and the impact that these things have on the nation's future and the everyday lives of the citizens. Levin also hosts "The Mark Levin Show," and prior to joining FOX, he served as an adviser to some of President Ronald Reagan's cabinet members.

channel.desc: As part of her role as FOX Business Network's global markets editor, business journalist Maria Bartiromo hosts this weekly Sunday morning show on FBN sister network FOX News Channel that focuses more on the general economy than the stock market specifically. The hourlong show provides viewers with information about how recent news events affect the economy. In addition, Bartiromo interviews business leaders and newsmakers on topics that include job creation and investment opportunities.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Inside the Statue Wars
channel.desc: From students toppling and beheading the statue of Egerton Ryerson to protestors tearing down monuments of Queen Victoria, Queen Elizabeth and Sir John A. Macdonald, the summer of 2021 ignited an era of reckoning and re-evaluation of our past.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: My Neighbour Adolf
channel.desc: In 1960s South America, A Holocaust survivor suspects his neighbour is Adolf Hitler. Disbelieved, he investigates and reluctantly befriends the man to gather evidence. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Day One Shorts 2024
channel.desc: A robot art student who is othered by his human teacher and classmates is tasked with creating a painting about love. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sachies Kitchen
channel.desc: Chef Sachie Nomura is in Rotorua cooking with Ngahi Bidois on the shores of Lake Tarawera, she meets BBQ experts Shaun and Alia Branson and vegan donut cook Kaya Sparke. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Brain Busters
channel.desc: Brain Busters puts everyday kids to the test in a variety of challenges that test their smarts, speed and strength. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Kura Tuatahi
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Kura Tuatahi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ASB Polyfest 2025
channel.desc: NEW: Featuring Ng? Taiohi o Panuku - Henderson High School, Whakaata M?ori presents performances from the M?ori Stage of ASB Polyfest 2025, as the festival marks 50 years of rangatahi excellence.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. The tupu are dying and Tai pushes past her fear of her matakitetanga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. The kids prank Grace to leave their farm. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Tai tries to figure out why the tupu are still dying. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Nurturing Hope
channel.desc: A heart-warming factual reality tv series that follows Kaikohe mother, first language speaker Clara Aperahama Kopa and the journey to improve the life of her severely disabled son, Mungzy. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: NEW: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Once Were Gardeners
channel.desc: NEW: Kahutane and Whitney started their garden because they had to. Their food forest grew into a place that sustained, and helped them to heal.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Top of the South
channel.desc: NEW: At the top of South Island, from Golden Bay to the Marlborough Sounds, a community of M?ori are fighting to maintain their way of life and a connection to the sea that was passed down to them from their t?puna. As modernity threatens this existence, how far will they go to protect their way of life, and secure the future of their grandchildren.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: NEW: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Flee
channel.desc: Amin Nawabi grapples with a painful secret he has kept hidden for 20 years, one that threatens to detail the life he has built for himself and his soon to be husband. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: Music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. Includes old music videos updated with graphic factoids. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. In this episode we visit, Hawaiian Canoe Adventures, and Waka Abel Tasman. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Iconic archival series documenting the unique stories and histories of M?ori. (R).[(96057)]

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Hanukkah On Rye
channel.desc: Sparks fly when a matchmaker pairs Molly and Jacob, until they discover that they are rival deli owners. Will a Hanukkah miracle keep their love afloat.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Boyfriends of Christmas Past
channel.desc: As Christmas approaches, Lauren is visited by the ghosts of four ex-boyfriends. She must learn to open her heart or risk losing her best friend, Nate.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Merry Ex-Mas
channel.desc: In an awkward turn of events, a man gets snowed in at Christmas with his ex-wife, her wealthy suitor, his former mother in law and his daughter.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Holiday Stocking
channel.desc: In Mahogany's first ever Christmas Movie, three estranged sisters are brought back together by a family Christmas tradition - the Holiday Stocking Game.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Deck The Walls
channel.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Very Vermont Christmas
channel.desc: A local champion skier and Vermont brew master teams up with an unlikely match to create a seasonal microbrew to save her family's business before Christmas.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: All I Need For Christmas
channel.desc: Looking for inspiration, singer songwriter Maggie travels home and finds a spark with app developer Archer, who's trying to repair his relationship with his sister.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Royal Christmas Holiday
channel.desc: An ambitious reporter looking for her big break and an impetuous prince sent to New York on assignment have their worlds collide during the holidays.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Private Princess Christmas
channel.desc: After failing in her royal duties, Princess Violet is sent to an American leadership training programme where she makes an unexpected connection with instructor, Captain Ryan.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Stars
channel.desc: When aspiring R&B artist Layla crosses paths with amateur songwriter Spence, she thinks she's found her shot at finally getting a record deal.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Christmas In New Hope
channel.desc: An aspiring influencer and mother of a girl living with Down syndrome enters a home improvement competition to save her bungalow before Christmas.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas On Cherry Lane
channel.desc: Over the Christmas holidays, three couples at different stages in their lives navigate massive turning points.[(96057)]

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Wind Of Change In Japan: The Deaflympics' Hope For Inclusivity
channel.desc: In November 2025, the Summer Deaflympic Games will be held in Tokyo. We meet some of the athletes who will take part, and look at local efforts toward inclusivity for people with hearing disabilities.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: We look at Self-Defense Forces disaster prep, including their response team's special equipment and techniques, and a new tsunami prediction system.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Museum Japan
channel.desc: Shiga Prefecture / Nagayama Yuko (Architect)\nFor 400 years, a group of stonemasons have been building walls using natural stone. Nagayama learns how a stone's qualities are assessed and utilized.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Magical Japanese
channel.desc: This episode focuses on words related to fukuro (bag). Reflecting its unique wrapping culture, Japan has a wide variety of bags, leading to an equal variety of Japanese words and expressions.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
channel.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life
channel.desc: It's late at night, when all are fast asleep. A young man and woman huddle together along the veranda outside of a house, attending to a ... rooster. What could the pair be up to?\n\n*\"Making the Rooster Drunk to Prevent His Crowing at Dawn\" (1767-68) by Suzuki Harunobu.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 15, Day 7 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Neo Japonism
channel.desc: There are nearly 190,000 Japanese-style restaurants around the world and 90 percent are run by non-Japanese chefs. We look at how global cultures and trends are updating Japanese cuisine.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Navigating Disasters
channel.desc: In this series we share Japan's disaster preparedness knowledge with viewers around the world. This time we zero in on disasters related to heavy snowfall. As global warming progresses, increasingly heavy snow loads are threatening people's lives. Record-breaking snowstorms have struck far and wide, disrupting city functions and even impacting regions that rarely see that type of weather. Scientists have been working to unravel the mechanisms behind snow disasters and mitigate future risk. Join us as we visit the front lines of disaster prevention and highlight how Japanese people have learned to live with snow.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.title: J Melo
channel.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week, three energetic idol groups: 12-member group ?ME, Hello! Project group Angerme, and Cho Tokimeki ? Sendenbu, who just released a new single.\nOn Demand until November 23, 2025.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. \"I want to see my owner again!\" Charo starts his adventure back home.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: *First broadcast on November 16, 2025\nOver 70% of Japanese people are said to use eyeglasses. We visit Sabae, in Fukui, where over 90% of Japan's glasses are made, and explore the history of Japanese eyewear and the latest technology.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: We head to Yashima, where the local boss cat leads us to a temple along the Shikoku Pilgrimage. The temple grounds are home to cats that nap, play, and greet pilgrims and other visitors.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
channel.desc: Many now rarely seen crafts live on in the remote villages of the Kii Mountains. We see aged artisans producing pigment from pine tree soot and crafting traditional wooden buckets and tubs.

channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The New Adventures Of Rockie And Her Friends
channel.desc: Rockie and her buddies are given an exciting new gadget for talking to strangers far away. But Rockie's conversation with one such stranger leads her to peril.\n\nEducational theme: Distinction between right and wrong.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: U\u0026i
channel.desc: \"i\" is in love with new student \"u,\" and gives him some cookies. She's shocked with his disappointed look and becomes depressed. But \"u\" is allergic to eggs, and is therefore unable to eat cookies.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: The Holiest Place.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ramen Japan
channel.desc: What makes these one-of-a-kind handmade noodles so unique?! Come to Sano for a taste you won't find anywhere else.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Crests are symbols of families and organizations. Once the privilege of the imperial and samurai classes, they were adopted by merchants and the populace as marks of pride.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Today: fielding an urgent request on the phone. Dong Van Huu, from Vietnam, designs blueprints at an architecture company. He first became interested in Japanese architecture as a college student in Vietnam. In 2015, he came to Japan as a technical intern. Now, he works at the company where he formerly interned. His desire to improve means overcoming challenges including unfamiliar terms and detailed measurements. In a roleplay challenge, he deals with an urgent request on the phone about blueprints that are missing key information.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: The whole world loves jeans. But they're also all too often thrown away. Kawahara Takuya upcycles this discarded denim combining different textures and fading to create stylish clothes with a unique sensibility that's seen them grow in popularity. His indispensable partner, Yamasawa Ryoji, buys used jeans from overseas by the ton. Both men are denim devotees who are dedicated to rescuing and reusing what was thrown out, making it cooler than cool again.

channel.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: The Holiest Place.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 16, Day 8 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ramen Japan
channel.desc: What makes these one-of-a-kind handmade noodles so unique?! Come to Sano for a taste you won't find anywhere else.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Crests are symbols of families and organizations. Once the privilege of the imperial and samurai classes, they were adopted by merchants and the populace as marks of pride.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Today: fielding an urgent request on the phone. Dong Van Huu, from Vietnam, designs blueprints at an architecture company. He first became interested in Japanese architecture as a college student in Vietnam. In 2015, he came to Japan as a technical intern. Now, he works at the company where he formerly interned. His desire to improve means overcoming challenges including unfamiliar terms and detailed measurements. In a roleplay challenge, he deals with an urgent request on the phone about blueprints that are missing key information.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: The whole world loves jeans. But they're also all too often thrown away. Kawahara Takuya upcycles this discarded denim combining different textures and fading to create stylish clothes with a unique sensibility that's seen them grow in popularity. His indispensable partner, Yamasawa Ryoji, buys used jeans from overseas by the ton. Both men are denim devotees who are dedicated to rescuing and reusing what was thrown out, making it cooler than cool again.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Neo Japonism
channel.desc: There are nearly 190,000 Japanese-style restaurants around the world and 90 percent are run by non-Japanese chefs. We look at how global cultures and trends are updating Japanese cuisine.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Navigating Disasters
channel.desc: In this series we share Japan's disaster preparedness knowledge with viewers around the world. This time we zero in on disasters related to heavy snowfall. As global warming progresses, increasingly heavy snow loads are threatening people's lives. Record-breaking snowstorms have struck far and wide, disrupting city functions and even impacting regions that rarely see that type of weather. Scientists have been working to unravel the mechanisms behind snow disasters and mitigate future risk. Join us as we visit the front lines of disaster prevention and highlight how Japanese people have learned to live with snow.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
channel.desc: Many now rarely seen crafts live on in the remote villages of the Kii Mountains. We see aged artisans producing pigment from pine tree soot and crafting traditional wooden buckets and tubs.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The New Adventures Of Rockie And Her Friends
channel.desc: Rockie and her buddies are given an exciting new gadget for talking to strangers far away. But Rockie's conversation with one such stranger leads her to peril.\n\nEducational theme: Distinction between right and wrong.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: U\u0026i
channel.desc: \"i\" is in love with new student \"u,\" and gives him some cookies. She's shocked with his disappointed look and becomes depressed. But \"u\" is allergic to eggs, and is therefore unable to eat cookies.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: J Melo
channel.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week, three energetic idol groups: 12-member group ?ME, Hello! Project group Angerme, and Cho Tokimeki ? Sendenbu, who just released a new single.\nOn Demand until November 23, 2025.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. \"I want to see my owner again!\" Charo starts his adventure back home.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: *First broadcast on November 16, 2025\nOver 70% of Japanese people are said to use eyeglasses. We visit Sabae, in Fukui, where over 90% of Japan's glasses are made, and explore the history of Japanese eyewear and the latest technology.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: We head to Yashima, where the local boss cat leads us to a temple along the Shikoku Pilgrimage. The temple grounds are home to cats that nap, play, and greet pilgrims and other visitors.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Chatroom Japan
channel.desc: A monk from Myanmar came to Japan to build a temple for the people of his country. He believes it's his mission to offer them a place of sanctuary and provide them with physical and mental comfort.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Impacts: Climates Change The World
channel.desc: Episode 5 of this series on COP30 in Brazil examines agroforestry, a combination of agriculture and forestry promoted by scientists as a potential method of regenerating rainforests.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Museum Japan
channel.desc: Shiga Prefecture / Nagayama Yuko (Architect)\nFor 400 years, a group of stonemasons have been building walls using natural stone. Nagayama learns how a stone's qualities are assessed and utilized.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: We meet American Parker Allen, a Tokyo-based consultant who helps foreigners purchase vacant houses in Japan, and Argentinian-born Komatsu Graciela Ana who runs a dairy farm in Shibetsu, Hokkaido.

channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 BC to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Lacquer.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: We look at Self-Defense Forces disaster prep, including their response team's special equipment and techniques, and a new tsunami prediction system.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Magical Japanese
channel.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. In this episode, poet and literary translator Peter MacMillan travels to Matsue City, Shimane Prefecture, where the writer and journalist Lafcadio Hearn (1850-1904) lived. Hearn is known for his compilation of Japanese ghost stories, Kwaidan, and had a deep interest in Japanese spirituality and folk religion. We visit the places that inspired Hearn in Matsue and look at some expressions related to ghosts along the way.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: Totsukawa Village is located on the southern tip of Nara Prefecture in the center of the Kii Peninsula. Most of the village is covered with steep mountains, and the residents live in more than 50 settlements. It is the villagers themselves who are responsible for keeping the traditions and opening up the future of the village. The running of the settlements is thoroughly discussed by everyone involved. This is an autumn story about a village different from any other in Japan.

channel.name: PopTV US
channel.title: While You Were Sleeping
channel.desc: Lonely transit worker Lucy Eleanor Moderatz (Sandra Bullock) pulls her longtime crush, Peter (Peter Gallagher), from the path of an oncoming train. At the hospital, doctors report that he's in a coma, and a misplaced comment from Lucy causes Peter's family to assume that she is his fianc?e. When Lucy doesn't correct them, they take her into their home and confidence. Things get even more complicated when she finds herself falling for Peter's sheepish brother, Jack (Bill Pullman).

channel.name: PopTV US
channel.title: Practical Magic
channel.desc: Sally and Gillian Owens, born into a magical family, have mostly avoided witchcraft themselves. But when Gillian's vicious boyfriend, Jimmy Angelov, dies unexpectedly, the Owens sisters give themselves a crash course in hard magic. With policeman Gary Hallet growing suspicious, the girls struggle to resurrect Angelov - and unwittingly inject his corpse with an evil spirit that threatens to end their family line.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: The Lesson
channel.desc: Dua siswa nakal dan tak sopan bertingkah saat Pak Gale mengajar. Sang guru yang tak dapat menoleransi perilaku keduanya pun memutuskan untuk menyandera dan memberi mereka ganjaran yang tak akan pernah dilupakan.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Whisper Of Silent Body
channel.desc: Saat menyelidiki suatu kasus pembunuhan, ahli patologi forensik Qin Ming beserta asistennya dan seorang detektif berhasil mengungkap rahasia dari kasus pembunuhan nan misterius 16 tahun yang lalu di gunung bersalju.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: The Revenge
channel.desc: Ruo Wei kembali ke rumah masa kecilnya bersama dua sahabatnya, dan bertemu kembali dengan sepupunya. Saat mereka ingin menikmati perjalanan, mereka terus dihantui oleh sejumlah peristiwa supranatural nan menakutkan.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Rooftop
channel.desc: Sekelompok teman mengundang Paul ke suatu pesta rahasia di atap kampus dan ia tewas secara tak sengaja. Paul pun bersumpah akan membalas dendam dengan menghantui mereka secara kejam untuk meminta pertanggung jawaban.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Creepy Pasta
channel.desc: Seorang pemuda mencari petunjuk tentang situasinya yang tengah terjebak di sebuah rumah kosong, yang sebenarnya terdapat pada serangkaian video nan viral. Namun, video-video tersebut secara perlahan merusak pikirannya.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: In Cycle
channel.desc: Sepasang suami istri yang tampak bahagia tiba di suatu pulau terpencil untuk liburan menyelam, tapi ternyata sang suami berencana untuk membunuh istrinya. Namun, rencana itu terhalang oleh serangkaian peristiwa aneh.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Last Girl Standing
channel.desc: Camryn mulai berpikir untuk membuka lembaran baru setelah seorang pembunuh bertopeng membunuh teman-temannya secara brutal. Namun, ia merasa curiga bahwa si pembunuh telah kembali untuk menghabisi dirinya.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Mid-Night Two
channel.desc: Yi Cheng dan teman-temannya bertualang ke suatu gunung nan angker, tempat persembunyian sesosok mayat purba dan api hantu nan abadi. Kemudian pada pukul 02.30 pagi, beberapa teman Yi Cheng menghilang satu per satu.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: The Cleaning Lady
channel.desc: Alice bersahabat dengan petugas kebersihan bernama Shelly, gadis misterius yang memiliki bekas luka bakar di wajahnya. Namun, Alice tak sengaja menemukan sejarah kelam Shelly, lalu terlibat dalam aksi balas dendam.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Waning?Moon
channel.desc: Seorang cenayang terkenal yang sangat dihormati, Nuanchan, ingin melatih keponakannya yang bernama Ploy untuk menggantikannya. Namun, nyawa mereka berada dalam bahaya kala Ploy jatuh cinta dengan teman masa kecilnya.

channel.title: An Unquiet Grave
channel.desc: Setahun setelah istri Jamie tewas secara tragis dalam suatu kecelakaan mobil, ia membujuk saudari sang istri, Ava, untuk menemaninya ke lokasi kecelakaan guna melakukan sebuah ritual nan aneh.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Tales Of The Undeparted
channel.desc: Delapan anggota AKB48 berkumpul di sebuah kuil untuk membagikan kisah pribadi yang paling misterius dan menyeramkan, seperti cerita hantu, legenda urban, atau aktivitas gaib yang beredar di masyarakat Jepang.[(96057)]

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: I'm Not Feeling Myself Tonight
channel.desc: Hapless Jon Pigeon works in a sex research institute. To seduce a colleague, he invents an aphrodisiac-emitter machine turning any man or woman into a horny fiend. Contains nudity.

channel.title: Bonanza
channel.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant - physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

channel.desc: The Texan, a Civil War Veteran whose reputation of being the fastest gun in the west precedes him, roams across Texas from town to town, not looking for trouble, but trouble finds him.
